Silvio Berlusconi

Dead

Born: 9/29/1936 in Milan, Italy

Died: 6/12/2023

Age: 86

Noted For: Italian prime minister (1994-95, 2001-06, 2008-11); head of the center-right Forza Italia party (1994-2023). Convicted of tax fraud and temporarily banned from holding public office (2013-19).

Also see this person's photo entry in our Dead or Alive Data Base.
